org.teamfarce.mirch.entities

Class MapEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • org.teamfarce.mirch.entities.MapEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    tileLocation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPerson, Clue

    public class MapEntity
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
implements tileLocation
    Base class to represent different map entities.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String description 
      protected java.lang.String name 
      protected Room room 
      protected Vector2Int tileCoordinates
      This is the location on the map in terms of tiles can be set using setTileCoordinates(int, int) Note: this is different to com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite.position that is the position on the screen in terms of pixels, whereas this is in terms of map tiles relative to the bottom left of the map.

      Initialise the entity.
